name: Subway Run 3D - Summer Dash
description:
Subway Run 3D is an addictive endless runner game.
Keep moving forward by evading the trains and other obstacles and collect coins and other goodies on your way.
Subway Run 3D presents,
- Beautiful Graphics
- Different types of obstacles
- addictive music
- Coins and other pickup boosts like double jump to make the game more fun
- smooth swipe controls
- simple and addictive game play
Do not forget to Log in to Game Center to share your score with your friends and world wide.
Summers Update :
The winters and the Christmas is over and the summer season is upon us. Enjoy the bright days and warm environment while jumping and dashing through the busy streets. Jump over the cars and the containers and collect as many coins as you can.
Features :
- New Music track
- Summer environment
- new and day graphics
